TextBox.Text: {\rtf1\deff0{\fonttbl{\f0 Calibri;}{\f1 Segoe UI;}{\f2 Malgun Gothic;}}{\colortbl ;\red0\green0\blue255 ;\red255\green255\blue255 ;}{\*\defchp \f1\fs22}{\stylesheet {\ql Normal;}{\*\cs1\f1\fs22 Default Paragraph Font;}{\*\cs2\ul\f1\fs22\cf1 Hyperlink;}{\*\ts3\tsrowd\fs22\ql\tsvertalt\tscellcbpat2\tscellpct0\cltxlrtb Normal Table;}}{\*\listoverridetable}{\info}\nouicompat\splytwnine\htmautsp\expshrtn\spltpgpar\deftab720\sectd\marglsxn1440\margrsxn1440\margtsxn1440\margbsxn1440\headery720\footery720\pgwsxn12240\pghsxn15840\cols1\colsx720\pard\plain\ql{\field\dxfldcodeview{\*\fldinst{\f2\fs32\cf0 docvariable DataItem0}}{\fldrslt{\f2\fs32\cf0 this_year (Max)}}}{\f2\fs32\cf0 Year to date hours }\f2\fs32\cf0\par}
